long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers automatic webpage reloading tailored to your preferences. Key features include:

Set Custom Refresh Intervals: Choose how often you want a page to reload (e.g., every minute, every hour).

Condition-Based Reloading: Configure specific conditions that trigger a page reload, like content changes or page load errors.

Hands-Free Operation: Once settings are configured, the extension will handle reloading automaticallyâ€”no need to click or interact with the page.

Seamless Browsing Experience: Allows you to focus on your work or browsing without the need to manually refresh pages.

This feature is ideal for monitoring updates on websites, ensuring uninterrupted access to the latest information or real-time data without constant manual input.
